sen.j: 蘇我 高麗（そが の こま）は古墳時代の豪族。
sen.e: Soga no Koma is a member of local ruling family in the Kofun period (tumulus period).
Soga no Koma was a member of a local ruling family in the Kofun period (tumulus period).
sen.cmt: ・時制を変更 ・a を追加しました。
sen.e: Soga no Koma was a member of a local ruling family in the Kofun period (tumulus period).
He is a child of 蘇我韓子.
sen.cmt: 蘇我韓子→定訳不明ですが原文のままとしています。
sen.e: He was a child of 蘇我韓子.
He was a child of 蘇我韓子.
He is the father of SOGA no Iname.
He was the father of SOGA no Iname.
He was the father of SOGA no Iname.
His real name is 蘇我 馬背.
sen.cmt: 蘇我 馬背→定訳不明ですが原文のままとしています。
sen.e: His real name was 蘇我 馬背.
His real name was 蘇我 馬背.

sen.j: 母は、高麗毘賣（こまひめ）。
sen.e: His mother is Komahime.
His mother was Komahime.
His mother was Komahime.

sen.j: 母が高麗（高句麗）人だったので、高麗と呼ばれたとする説がある。
sen.e: There is a theory that he was called koma because his mother was the person from Goguryeo (kingdom of Korea).
There is a theory that he was called koma because his mother was the person from Goguryeo (kingdom of Korea).
There is a theory that he was called koma because his mother was the person from Goguryeo (kingdom of Korea).

sen.j: 業績はいっさい不明で『古事記』『日本書紀』にも登場しない。
sen.e: His achievements were completely unknown and he didn't appear either in "Kojiki" (The Records of Ancient Matters) or in "Nihonshoki" (Chronicles of Japan).
His achievements were completely unknown and he didn't appear either in "Kojiki" (The Records of Ancient Matters) or in "Nihonshoki" (Chronicles of Japan).
His achievements were completely unknown and he didn't appear either in "Kojiki" (The Records of Ancient Matters) or in "Nihonshoki" (Chronicles of Japan).
